I originally thought that this was a rumor made up by everyone to undermine the prestige of the Holy See, but I never expected that the news was actually true.

With the conclusion, the process was much simpler. Everyone agreed that they had found the truth behind the fight between the Holy See and the Alpha Kingdom.

Deep down, everyone was still secretly admiring the Church's tolerance. The inherited artifacts had been taken away, but they didn't just mobilize the army to attack.

No, to be exact, the Church did mobilize troops, but they were unlucky. They didn't have time to look for the bad luck of the Alpha Kingdom, and got themselves involved first.

Regardless of the grudges between the Holy See and the Alpha Kingdom, the faces of the alien sanctuaries who were imprisoned were all looking unhappy at the moment.

The plan went wrong again and again, and the situation was completely out of control. If we continued fighting, it would be a life-threatening situation.

"stop!"

Delis' words slowed down the actions of everyone, but did not affect Bear Stearns' actions. The big bear just now made the bear kid jealous.

A big slap was thrown directly at him. If the unicorn hadn't helped to take the blame, there would have been a fatal incident.

"Bear Stearns is back!"

Hudson called to the cub.

If you can take advantage, you will earn money. If we really push these alien sanctuaries into a corner, no one will be able to escape unscathed today.

The Sanctuary was desperately trying to drag people down with it, and the scene was terrifying just to think about it. The elite of the kingdom were all here, and if they were wiped out, they wouldn't be able to recover for 20 years.

In this era of great contention, if you don't have the strength in your hands, it will be too late to cry later.

The leaders of both sides called for a stop, and all the Saint Domain masters present breathed a sigh of relief. In the previous battle, they had roughly figured out the strength of the other side.

We all have plenty of life left, so we can enjoy life and continue to climb the path of cultivation. There is no need to risk our lives for a momentary impulse.

"Ms. Delis, the fight is over and you are no longer angry. Let's get back to business!"

As soon as Hudson finished speaking, everyone rolled their eyes. The fight was indeed over, but "venting anger" was clearly about being angry!

Looking at Bear Stearns' silly and cute appearance, who could have thought that this guy was the irritable Earth Bear just now?

Delis undoubtedly paid the price for her talk. If she had known that the angry bear was so powerful, she would never have talked about the big bear.

"snort!"

"Marshal Hudson, you should know the unspoken rules in the Sanctuary circle.

In order to maintain the balance of the continent, the ancestors of all races set a rule that the Holy Land cannot attack ordinary people at will.

Let's forget about this incident, but we won't allow it to happen a second time!"

Using the harshest tone and the most cowardly words. Hudson wanted to laugh, but swallowed it back.

Some things cannot be done too drastically, women will not care about the consequences when they are crazy. If you offend someone too much, she will run to your territory and mess around, then you will suffer a great loss.

Even if we can retaliate, revenge cannot make up for the losses!

As a mature lord, you must learn to weigh the pros and cons.

"Ms. Delis, you should know that I, Hudson, have always been the most disciplined person. How could I possibly break the rules?

This incident was not caused by me. If the orcs hadn't taken the initiative to provoke, there would be no tragedy now!

I have a special invitation letter in my hand, written by the orcs to the kingdom, you may want to take a look at it first."

As he spoke, Hudson had already thrown the invitation over.

Those who break the rules will be retaliated by the rules. Not only will they arouse the hatred of the alien sanctuaries, but they will also have many more enemies within the human race.

Hudson, who is used to playing politics, naturally would not fall into this trap. He had already prepared a backup plan before launching the action.

After receiving the invitation, Delis's face turned green with anger. The invitation must have been written by an orc, but it was hard to say whether it could represent the orc empire.

Judging from the contents of the letter alone, the actions of the Alpha Kingdom were completely legal. After all, it was the orcs who took the initiative to invite them to fight.

"Marshal Hudson, the origin of this letter is unknown. I'm afraid it can't represent the Orc Empire, right?"

Delis said through gritted teeth.

She has already said that this matter is over, and as long as she gives a promise that it will not happen again, the matter will come to an end.

This is a good choice for all parties. After all, the Alpha Kingdom has gained a great advantage this time, enough to silence the Orc Empire for ten years. It is definitely the right thing to stop while you are ahead.

But Hudson didn't even give this little face. Instead, he put all the blame on the orcs. It was obvious that he didn't want to take any responsibility at all.

"Ms. Delis, you can't say that. The people who sent the invitation letter were orcs, and the people who delivered the letter were also orcs. How do I know if they can represent the Orc Empire?

Anyway, the orcs took the initiative to ask our strong men from the Holy Land to take action. Everything now can only be regarded as the result of their own actions.

It's not over yet. According to the request in the letter, we haven't cast all the forbidden spells yet!

It's rare to come across such a bizarre request to have a forbidden spell cast on one's head, so we have no choice but to fulfill their wish.

If you feel there is any problem, go ask those who made the request. These are the internal affairs of the Orc Empire, and we are not in a position to interfere!"

Hudson babbled seriously.

The invitation letter was indeed written by the orcs, but they were forced to write it with a knife at their necks.

Under normal circumstances, such a letter would not have any legal significance, but now we have won the battle!

Justice always belongs to the victor.

"snort!"

"Hudson, I don't care whether the content of your letter is true or false, this is the only time this has happened.

I have already told you what I am saying. If you dare to continue to go against my will, then you can try!

By then, you old antiques of the human race will be speechless!"

After saying that, Delis turned around and left with her people, leaving only their backs behind.

The amount of information was so overwhelming that Hudson couldn't even comprehend it all.

"The old antiques of the human race." Isn't the team he leads the old antiques of the human race?

Could there be an even older existence?

Damn, there is no record of this in the kingdom's data. Hudson was overwhelmed for a moment, and his expression when he looked at everyone was wrong.

The kingdom has a limited history, so it is normal not to know some secrets. But it is impossible that all the great nobles in the country do not know all of them!

At least those families who were great nobles three hundred years ago and are still great nobles now should know something.

Hudson was bound to be disappointed. Judging from the confused expressions of the crowd, they didn't know either.

It makes sense to think about it. If you know these secrets, there is no reason not to tell them. After all, we all fell into the trap together.

If they got into trouble, they would most likely die before Hudson. If the alien alliance really wanted to surround and kill them, the soldiers would be the first to suffer, and Hudson could still escape with Long Xiong.

Even if he ran to the southern continent and found a boss who could take on the tough job, he would still receive the treatment of a great noble.

As the human race was able to become the overlord of the continent, it certainly had no shortage of top powerhouses. At least from Delis's tone, Hudson sensed a hint of fear of the human race's powerhouses.

"Marshal, what should we do now?"

Archbishop Terran asked worriedly.

If what Delis said is true, then as the oldest force of the human race, the Holy See will definitely not be short of hidden antiques.

They would not care about ordinary things. But the problem is that he is holding a sacred artifact passed down from the Holy See, which is absolutely impossible to discard.

Can the Alpha Kingdom really keep the artifact under the watchful eyes of the Vatican?

Archbishop Terran was unsure.

"Throw a few forbidden spells along the way, and then we'll retreat!

The Holy Land of the Alien Alliance has appeared on the prairie. We must ensure the smooth opening of the Holy Land of Orc Heritage. The original plan can no longer be carried out. "

Hudson said, frowning.

With the alien alliance's sanctuary as a distraction, if you try to take over the orcs' heritage holy land, you might end up getting yourself into trouble.

The Kingdom had already won a great victory in this operation. There was no need to take the team out on an adventure just to achieve perfection in the end.

Without the participation of the strong men from the Holy Land, Hudson didn't think that the people below could break through the trap painstakingly prepared by the orcs.

If we suffer heavy losses in the battle, all the previous victories will be in vain.

"Marshal, the alien alliance has made its position clear. If we take action again, I'm afraid..."

Before Robert could finish, Hudson interrupted, "I said to cast a forbidden spell, but I didn't ask you to do it.

Just because the strong ones in the Holy Land cannot take action, it doesn't mean that the people below cannot take action.

Even if the elves saw it with their own eyes, they can't say we violated the rules!"
Chapter 531:
Chapter 211: The Five Patriarchs

In the Bearman Royal Court, Delis was speechless as she listened to the complaints of a group of orc high-ranking officials.

It's all because of strength. The orcs are not strong enough, so they deserve to be beaten.

The boss will only protect his obedient younger brothers. Ten years ago, the Orc Empire was second only to the Elves in terms of comprehensive strength in the alliance, so naturally, they would not be content to be a younger brother.

Now that they are weaker and under the pressure of survival, the beastmen have lowered their proud heads. But I can't be a younger brother just because I want to.

There is no love or hate without reason. The value of the orcs to the elves is limited to restraining the Alpha Kingdom.

Leaving this nail is enough. It is pure dreaming to expect the elves to fully support them.

"Okay, I know everything you said. We have warned the human race that their sanctuary will not take action easily in the future.

You should quickly open the inheritance holy land and train your own holy land masters as soon as possible!"

Delis said calmly.

If you lose a fight, you must never talk about it. Even a strong person needs to save face and cannot reveal his dark history.

"Your Excellency, the enemy did not leave immediately. Instead, they continued to ravage the grassland without any..."

Before the Bear King could finish his words, Delis interrupted him and asked, "Did their Saint Domain experts take action?

If they violate the rules, we will take action; if they don't, it will be a conventional conflict."

Upon hearing this answer, the orc leaders were furious.

"Conventional conflict", isn't this just a lie!

If it weren't for the Sanctuary Dragon acting as a transport plane, with the normal movement speed of humans, they would have been blocked on the prairie long ago.

If the strong men from the Holy Land do not take part in the war and mobilize tens of thousands of elite troops to attack, Hudson and his crew will definitely suffer heavy losses.

If they were to be encircled and suppressed a few more times, they would be wiped out. It is simply impossible to let them be so arrogant until now.

Unfortunately, the Sanctuary in the Anti-Human Alliance seemed to deliberately forget the role played by the Sanctuary Dragon, and only saw that the person who took action was not strong enough to reach the Sanctuary.

He wanted to argue, but the words came to his lips and he swallowed them back. The decision made by the strong men in the Holy Land could not be changed by a few words.

Judging from their route of action, Hudson and his crew have already left the Bearman Royal Court's sphere of influence and are on their way back, so there is no need to worry about others.

The one who was most panicked now was King Behemoth. As the neighbor of the Great Demon King Ha, he just happened to be blocking the other's way home. If he didn't send a few more forbidden spells, it would be a shame to the "friendly" neighborly relationship between the two sides.

But now the Behemoths are just here to make up the numbers, so even if the Behemoth King speaks, it will be meaningless.

No one in the empire is willing to buy into his ideas, so you can't expect the elves to buy into his ideas, right?

The Alliance does not want to cause any more trouble, so the orcs can only face reality. The root of all the problems was planted a hundred years ago, and now they are just paying the price for the decisions made by their ancestors.

...

They stopped and started along the way until the mage corps was exhausted, and then ended this strategic attack.

The specific achievements may be only a few hundred thousand, but the political impact brought about by it is unparalleled.

When the team arrived at the royal capital, Caesar IV had already come out to greet them with a group of princes and nobles, and everyone was smiling.

As the protagonist, Hudson clearly felt that his king's smile was a little unnatural. Needless to say, the problem was probably caused by him.

"Being too successful will threaten the ruler" is a very tricky thing for any monarch.

What's worse is that the heroes who "shocked the king" were not very obedient and often turned a deaf ear to the king's orders.

Before the operation began, everyone agreed on the mission objective: to destroy the holy site of the Orc Empire's heritage.

When it came to the actual execution, except for the task itself, all other aspects were done very well.

The glorious victory covered up all the problems. Even though he knew it was disobedience, Caesar IV could not say anything.

Finding fault at a time like this only proved how foolish his previous plan was.

The brief gaffe was fleeting, and behind the glorious victory, there were countless crises lurking.

The first issue to be addressed is the artifact. The orcs all know that the Scepter of Glory is in the hands of the Alpha Kingdom, and it is estimated that the Holy See will also know it in a few days.

There is no compromise. Even if the artifact is returned to the Vatican, they will not appreciate it.

If one wants to legally possess the artifact for a long time, the only way is to establish a new church. However, taking this step is equivalent to declaring war on the church.

The political influence is greater than that of the previous establishment of the Frankish Kingdom's new church. With the inherited artifact in hand, it can completely act in the name of the Lord of the Dawn.

Once the cards are revealed, the legitimacy of the Holy See will inevitably suffer a comprehensive impact, and the two sides will then become mortal enemies, with no room for easing.

Compared to such a matter of life and death for the kingdom, "being too successful to be feared by the ruler" was nothing. Even though he knew that boasting about his achievements would only further boost Hudson's prestige, Caesar IV had no choice but to accept it.

In the upcoming tough battle, the whole kingdom must work together.

The grand ceremony now is not only a celebration to welcome the heroes, but also a way to show off the kingdom's military power to the outside world, and by the way, it also connects the Five-Nation Alliance together.

Hudson didn't like this solemn celebration banquet at all. There were princes and nobles everywhere, but no attractive noble ladies were seen.

For others, this kind of highest-ceremonial welcome banquet is an honor, but for Hudson, it is a waste of time.

This happens after every war, and anyone would get tired of it after experiencing it too many times. Hudson is the only one in the kingdom who has this kind of "happy" trouble.

If he had a choice, Caesar IV would have wanted to keep a low profile and pretend he didn't know, but there was no other way.

If the king did not express his gratitude for such a glorious victory, the princes, ministers and military officials in the court would not agree.

Compared with previous times, this celebration banquet is much more special.

As soon as the banquet began, Hudson gathered with six powerful Saint Realm warriors to exchange their cultivation experiences and ignored the guests at all.

Different circles have different rules of the game. In the circle of the continent's top masters, strength is valued, and status is not worth mentioning.

Anyone present here can be treated as a noble in any country, which is completely different from those nobles outside who rely on inheritance from their ancestors.

After getting into the circle of powerful people, Hudson could only listen to their conversations. As a seventh-level magician/earth knight, he was not yet able to participate in the discussion.

Hudson did not speak, but Bear Stearns and Maxim joined the discussion. Every Saint Domain expert has his own unique views on the rules, and Warcraft is no exception.

With so many powerful Saint Realm warriors communicating together, if tickets were sold, this place would definitely be packed to the brim. Those eighth-level warriors outside would be willing to spend all they had to rush in.

Unfortunately, the idea of teaching everyone is not popular in the Aslant Continent. Any knowledge related to cultivation here is precious and must not be easily given to others.

Unless they are direct blood relatives, outsiders have no qualifications to study.

As an auditor, Hudson was confused by what he heard, but he still gained a lot.

It's not about how smart he is, it's mainly about being able to ask questions!

Perhaps because of his status as a master of magic potions, or perhaps out of friendship, everyone was very caring towards Hudson during the discussion and answered almost every question he asked.

For Hudson, who has to rely entirely on himself to figure things out, such communication is crucial.

The people who were communicating got so excited that they forgot the time of the banquet, which made things difficult for the guests attending the banquet outside.

Not all guests are strong and can stay at the banquet for a long time. But for this special celebration banquet, if the protagonist doesn't show up, everyone can't leave.

"Your Majesty, this has been going on for a whole day and night. How about sending the drunken guests back home to rest?"

The Prime Minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, suggested tactfully.

Getting drunk was out of the question for such a solemn occasion, but if you wanted to leave early, you had to find a suitable excuse.

Perhaps the powerful people in the Holy Land would not care about these things, but the kingdom had to abide by the etiquette.

"so be it!"

Caesar IV said with a slightly tired look.

If I had known that these powerful Saint Domain warriors were so good at talking, I should have arranged a separate exchange meeting for them instead of inviting them to the celebration banquet.

There's no point in regretting it. The discussion is going on intensely, and if you go over to interrupt them at this time, you'll just be attracting hatred.

"Wait, arrange for someone to set up a simple lounge in the palace, and arrange for everyone to take turns to sober up there."

Caesar IV then added.

I have to carry on with the game I set up even if I have to cry.

Now we can only hope that these powerful Saint Domain warriors don't communicate for ten days or half a month at a time, otherwise the show will be difficult to perform.

It turned out that Caesar IV had overthought. The strong men in the Holy Land could go without food or water for ten days or half a month, but Hudson, a mortal, could not stand it.

At midnight the next day, a few people who were still not satisfied walked out of the side hall and continued to attend the celebration banquet, as if they were unaware of the passage of time.

...

The next day, Hudson slept until noon. As soon as he opened his eyes, he was invited to the palace to discuss matters.

Not surprisingly, the only two topics were "artifacts" and "the Holy See".

After listening to the speeches of the nobles, Hudson finally understood why Caesar IV would rather have dark circles under his eyes and persisted until the powerful men from the Holy Land came out.

When you give someone a gift, you must have something in mind.

Simply wanting to show the kingdom's importance is not enough to make a king work so hard. The real purpose is to pull together the Five-Nation Alliance to establish a new church.

There is no doubt that the strong men in the Holy Land are members of the decision-making level in any major force, and the right to speak they possess is far beyond that of an envoy stationed abroad.

Instead of engaging in endless diplomatic negotiations, it is better to directly communicate with the decision-makers of various countries. Even if the strong men in the Holy Land are aloof and no longer involved in politics, no one can ignore their positions.

"Your Majesty, although getting rid of the control of the Church over faith is the common pursuit of the dignitaries of various countries, if we want the four countries to support us in establishing a new Church, the key is still to look at the interests.

When discussing religious issues, it is not advisable to involve too many secular things. It is best to directly promise them religious benefits.

The new church created by the Franks is already quite lenient, and no one has joined them. If we want to win the support of the four countries, we must be able to offer greater benefits. "

As soon as Hudson finished speaking, Archbishop Tyron's face darkened. Friendship is friendship, and interests are interests.

Allies do not necessarily support unconditionally. Especially when it comes to sensitive religious issues, they attract much attention.

Hudson's words also represent the thoughts of most of the secular nobles in the kingdom. It is no problem to ask everyone to support the establishment of a new church, but the price of winning the support of allies must be paid by the new church, and the secular nobles are not prepared to pay for it.

A few benefits are obviously not enough. If the country wants support, it has to give up some of the power of the core management of the Holy See.

Once a compromise is made in this regard, the Alpha family's establishment of a new church will become a joint establishment of five churches, and everyone will be a shareholder of this new church.

There is no doubt that the addition of four shareholders with decision-making power will definitely weaken the interests of the local religious faction headed by Archbishop Tyron.

"Marshal Hudson, if the four countries get involved, who will have the final say?

If we cannot obtain the management rights of the new Holy See, what is the point of establishing this new Holy See?

Anyway, there is a foreign alliance in the middle, and it does not affect our interests under the banner of the Frankish Church.

If that's the case, we can sell the Scepter of Glory in our hands for a good price and help the kingdom out of its financial deficit!"

The Prime Minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland questioned.

As a member of the royal family, he must give priority to the interests of the royal family. According to the plan, after the establishment of the Holy See, Archbishop Tyron, a member of the royal family, will serve as Pope.

The future royal family will combine religious power and secular power, establishing the royal family's supreme status in the country in one fell swoop.

"Prime Minister, although the power of the artifact is enormous, it only adds a deterrent to the kingdom, and we still have to confront the Church for this.

If the Franks offer a high enough price, selling the Scepter of Glory to them is not completely out of the question.

In this way, we can not only get rid of the hatred of the Church, but also solve the financial problems of the kingdom. "

Duke Hiro said with a smile.

Knowing clearly that the prime minister was speaking in a sarcastic way, he still jumped out to oppose him so openly. This was no longer a simple difference in political views, but a game between the great nobles and the royal power.

Everyone may not mind the concealment of the Scepter of Glory, but the royal family's desire to take the divine power into their pocket is something that all parties cannot accept.

Otherwise, if you come into conflict with the royal family over interests in the future, won't you be directly labeled a heretic?

It seemed that it was Duke Hiro who proposed to sell the Scepter of Glory, but in fact it was the common idea of a group of nobles.

No matter how good the artifact is, it is not their turn to control it. Rather than leaving it in the hands of the royal family and threatening their own safety, it is better to give it away in exchange for benefits.

"Your Excellency the Duke is right. What the kingdom needs most now is not an illusory church. The key is to solve the financial problem as soon as possible.

The Orc Empire has suffered a severe blow now. It is the best time for the Kingdom to destroy this old enemy. As long as we get rid of the financial crisis, we can prepare for the Eastern Expedition.

It's just a divine weapon, so we can just throw it away. As long as we are strong enough, we can still establish a new church even if we don't have a divine weapon!"

Marquis Zuel's words completely ignited the storm.

The two great nobles, one in the south and one in the north, expressed their opinions at the same time, which was equivalent to representing the common ideas of the nobles in the north and south.

Glancing at his ministers, Caesar IV saw trouble from the determined looks in their eyes.

I originally thought that Hudson's proposal was a scam, but I didn't expect that these domestic nobles would be so ruthless when it came to scamming the royal family.

In name, it seemed that Hudson obtained it and handed it over to the kingdom, and the royal family did not seem to pay anything. But in fact, the royal family had paid countless prices in secret.

The rise of a great noble is never smooth sailing. Behind the smooth rise of the Koslo family, there must be someone to protect them.

Sometimes targeting does not mean actual combat; suppression in secret is the norm.

For example: if you want to buy food, there is a shortage of food in the market; if you want to buy cloth, the cloth in the market is sold out...

For example: at a critical point where a transaction is required, business travelers suddenly disappear and never come again.

...

In an era when resources are monopolized, it is too easy to target an emerging noble family.

If you want to break the impasse, the best option is to obtain the support of a great noble family in advance and let everyone know that the blockade is meaningless.

In a sense, the rapid development of the Koslo family was also supported by the royal family.

The only problem was that Hudson jumped a little too fast, and his soaring reputation allowed the Koslow family to gain a firm foothold in the circle of great nobles, and it was somewhat out of control.

"enough!"

"The Scepter of Glory has fallen into the hands of the Kingdom. It is a generous gift from the Lord of Dawn. How can we use it to trade with others?

What we are going to discuss today is how to gain the support of the four countries, not to listen to your bad ideas. As a devout believer, I will not allow anyone to insult my faith!

Countless followers of the Lord of the Dawn in the country are watching us! I don't want to hear such blasphemous words again!"

Caesar IV shouted harshly.

If interests are not an option, then let's talk about faith. In this theocratic world, except for those fanatical arcanists, no noble dares to openly blaspheme God.

"Your Majesty, if we want the four nations to support us in establishing a new church, the best option is to make them our own.

Simply divide the diocese into five, appoint five patriarchs, and let each country handle its own religious affairs.

It just so happened that the sanctuaries sent by the four countries had not left yet, so he simply confronted them and invited the four of them to serve as the patriarchs of the four countries' dioceses.

If other countries join in the future, we can continue to add patriarchs to avoid further power struggles."

Hudson said cruelly.

Some teams must be chosen, but due to his special identity, he can neither fully support the royal family nor directly lead the aristocratic camp.

As a last resort, they could only resort to dirty tricks. According to Hudson's plan, the royal family got religious power, but not completely.

Now that the five patriarchs have come out and all the work is done, what is the Pope still needed for?

The difference between a Vatican without a Pope and a Vatican with a Pope is not just a title, but a completely different political status.

The Pope is a unique existence in the continent of Aslant, with supreme power. If you are accused of blasphemy, then that is blasphemy.

In comparison, the Patriarch is far inferior, just an archbishop with more power. If he talks too much nonsense, everyone can raise their fists and greet him.

To decide life and death with a single word is a power that belongs exclusively to the Pope.

If looks could kill, Archbishop Tyron would have cut Hudson into pieces. Yesterday we were good friends, but today he wants to cut off his path to becoming the Pope. He is simply not a human being.

"Your Excellency Marshal, the sanctuaries sent by the four nations are not clergy, so how can they serve as..."

Before Archbishop Taillon could finish, Hudson interrupted him and said, "Your Excellency, since we are going to establish a new church, we cannot be as traditional as before.

We are all believers of the Lord of Dawn. Who stipulates that those who hold religious positions must be clergymen?

These are bad habits that hinder the progress of the times. They were all left behind by the corrupt Vatican to fool the world. I think they should just be abolished.

The great Lord of the Dawn is inclusive, and all believers have the right to serve the gods, and no one can deprive them of this right! "

As he spoke, Hudson looked at Archbishop Terran with a hint of apology in his eyes. There was no other way, he could only apologize to his friend this time.

The news about the artifact had already leaked out. The king was determined to keep the Scepter of Glory, and even accused the king of blasphemy for it.

The position of the aristocratic group is also very clear, that is, they will never allow the royal family to control the Vatican.

If the situation continued, it might get out of control. In order to resolve the dispute, Hudson had to take action.

As the price of mediating the dispute, Archbishop Tyron's dream of becoming Pope was shattered.

The pattern of the five patriarchs was established, and the five dioceses were equal, even if they held a divine weapon, they were at most half a level higher. If you want to be the pope, you are dead when the other four patriarchs are dead!
Chapter 532:
Chapter 212: A Big Chess Game

As soon as the new plan came out, it immediately gained the support of the aristocratic group.

The same thing will be seen differently by different people.

The "Five Patriarchs" system was the end of Archbishop Tyron's dream of becoming the Pope, but for the aristocratic group, it was the best opportunity to fight for the "right to interpret religion."

If religious leaders can be secular people, then the doctrines can naturally be interpreted by secular people. Once the gate is opened, everyone can legally reach out to the doctrines.

At this moment, Caesar IV hesitated.

Establishing a pope is a great thing for the royal family, but not necessarily for the king.

There is no two suns in the sky, and no country has two masters.

The king and the pope live together in a small community. When their opinions conflict, who should they listen to?

But the king could not be the pope at the same time. According to the doctrine, the pope is a person chosen by God and must dedicate everything to God, so he can forget about getting married and having children.

When it comes to power, Caesar IV has to think twice. If the increase in the power of the royal family comes at the expense of the power of the king, then he has to reconsider.

The patriarchate system proposed by Hudson was another extreme. It not only diluted the power of the new church, but also placed ecclesiastical power under secular power.

"Patriarch", religious leader.

It sounds awesome, but after all, he is not an emperor and does not have supreme power.

In particular, it was epoch-making to allow non-clergy to serve as patriarchs, which meant that if the king wished, he could serve as the patriarch himself.

The entry threshold has been lowered, and the corresponding power has been greatly reduced. It is basically impossible to use religion as a big stick to interfere in the internal affairs of the lords.

Everyone can interpret the doctrine, which means that religion in the future kingdom, and even the continent, will be a mess.

It may not have much impact on the Lord of Dawn. Anyway, no matter how the doctrine changes, it will not change the belief in gods. However, it will definitely be disastrous for the vested interest groups attached to religion.

Caesar IV's hesitation was purely self-indulgent. When all the great nobles of the kingdom stood together, the king's choice was actually already determined.

Realizing that the situation was hopeless, the prime minister, the minister of war, and the archbishop remained silent.

Hearing voices of support all around him, the hesitant Caesar IV soon came to his senses and his worries instantly dropped by 1.

"Since everyone supports it, let's do it!

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs should seize the time to implement it and strive to reach an agreement with the four countries on this issue as soon as possible."

There is no need to struggle forcefully. This is the way the four countries like it the most. No one in power would refuse to legally control domestic religious rights.

With four more allies, many things would be easier to handle. If the Church caused trouble, the five of them would shoulder it together.

In fact, the current Alpha Kingdom is not afraid of the Holy See, but is only worried about the return of powerful people from the Holy See in the future.

However, these are only minor problems. Hundreds of years have passed, and even among direct blood relatives, the feelings between them have gradually faded, not to mention that they are just from the same family.

If you want to use these old antiques as thugs, I'm afraid you are still dreaming.

Talented players like Bear Stearns and Maxim are already very close to that stage now.

Knowing that he was doing voluntary labor this time, he still showed off his spoils, which definitely shows that he had ulterior motives.

Deep down, Hudson was already thinking about how to trick the two guys out of their gold coins.

Money only counts as money when it is circulated. Keeping it in their hands is a pure waste of resources.

With their wealth, they have already achieved financial freedom. Material needs are completely optional for them.

Relying on instinct to absorb the magical elements between heaven and earth is enough to sustain their survival, and food is just to satisfy their appetite.

The clothes are all natural, so there is no need to change or wash them. You can make a hole at random and use magic to reinforce it to make it a nest.

Having so much money in hand but neither spending it nor having children is completely unnecessary.

In the past, Hudson could still trick them into buying magic crystals to recharge his golden fingers.

In addition to giving back a portion of the energy to the two men, Hudson mainly relies on the purified energy to refine magic potions and sell them for cash.

It was no longer possible now. The speed at which the gold-eating beast devoured the money could not catch up with the speed at which these two guys made their fortunes. They could earn a lot of money in every battle.

At the beginning, Hudson could still share the spoils, but now, these two unscrupulous guys have learned to eat alone.

His motto is: "This is for the Kingdom, it does not involve contracts. You have to work as hard as you are paid."

These words seemed to be spoken to the kingdom's dignitaries, but in fact they were a subtle reminder to Hudson not to try to deduct their wages.

"Mr. Bear Stearns, the Near East Development Bank has recently launched a deposit business tailored specifically for high net worth clients like you.

As long as you deposit two million gold coins in the bank and keep it regularly for more than ten years, you will be given an annual interest of 0.3%.

For a term of more than fifty years, the interest rate can be increased to 0.6%; for a term of more than one hundred years, the interest rate can be increased to 1%; for a term of more than two hundred years, the interest rate can be 2%... For a term of more than one thousand years, the maximum annual interest rate is 10%.

Your funds are just sitting there anyway, and it's troublesome to keep them safe, so why not put them in a bank and earn some interest on them?"

Hudson tried his best to deceive.

Knowing that Maxim valued money, no one took the gold coins out of Long's pocket.

Even when Hudson's child was born, he would rather run to the Blackrock Mountains to catch monsters as a gift than spend a single gold coin.

In comparison, Bear Stearns was much more straightforward, announcing directly and generously that it would cover all the milk for the nephew in the future.

There was no other way. There were so many livestock on the ranch that Bear Stearns couldn't drink all the milk they produced. It would be more than enough to raise ten more Earth Bears. Hudson could only help reluctantly.

Not only milk, but even the meat in the lord's mansion comes from the Bear Ranch.

It was delivered to the lord's mansion on time every day. Nominally, it was sent to Bear Stearns, but as the most honorable Earth Bear, it had to be slaughtered and cooked immediately.

Anything that is more than half an hour old must be discarded, and food must be supplied 24 hours a day, with any uneaten food thrown away. When it comes to enjoying life, Bear Stearns is a true aristocratic bear.

Hudson was able to feed the Lord's Mansion by picking up the leftover food from Bear Stearns every day. Of course, there was no need to say such things, otherwise he would be laughed at by Bear for the rest of his life.

"Hudson, you can fool around all you want!

There's a thousand-year deposit, can you live to be a thousand years old?

It is still unknown whether the Koslo family can continue for a thousand years. Before the time is up, your Near East Development Bank will be gone. Who can I ask for payment?

You don't want to get something for free and trick me into taking care of your descendants for a thousand years, do you?

I'm telling you, get rid of this unrealistic idea as soon as possible. I still have a lot of good time to enjoy in my life, and I will never waste it on being a babysitter for your children and grandchildren!"

Bear Stearns shouted indignantly.

A thousand-year term, what's the difference between that and giving it for free?

No matter how high the interest rate is, it must be able to be repaid.

As a top student of mathematics, Bear Stearns easily came to the conclusion that even if all the gold coins in the entire continent were collected a thousand years later, they might not be able to be redeemed.

Hudson was not upset even though he had overstated his claims. It was inevitable that he would be exposed. 1.1 to the thousandth power was beyond the calculation range of a normal person.

"Bear Stearns, don't look down on others. Who are you looking down on with your mere thousand years of life?

Although the lifespan of our human race is short, once we enter the Holy Domain, we can live for 300 years. Once we enter the second level of the Holy Domain, we can live for 600 years. As long as we enter the third level of the Holy Domain, we can extend our lifespan by 1,200 years.

"What our ancestors were able to do, why can't I do it? Go out and ask around, is there anyone in the whole continent more talented than me?"

Hudson argued forcefully.

He didn't know whether he could live for a thousand years, but he refused to mention the question of how to pay off the debt.

"Come on, Hudson!

How did you get your reputation as a genius? Need I tell you more? You took it seriously when people outside boasted about it.

Even if you cultivate smoothly all the way to the third level of the Holy Domain, your life span is so short, and I will still have to take care of your affairs after your death.

Without further ado, the interest rate for a 100-year fixed deposit is 10%, and it will be redeemed annually. I don't believe that your Near East Development Bank has the ability to settle in one go! "

Bear Stearns' disdainful tone made Hudson very angry.

It turns out that learning math well is really useful, because the final result of 1.1 raised to the power of 100 is always in the unit of ten thousand.

It is impossible to achieve a ten thousand fold increase in value within a hundred years!

Instead, the payment is settled once a year without using compound interest. With the current profitability of the Near East Development Bank, the repayment can be completed smoothly.

"impossible!

At most 1.2%. You should know that these gold coins will not increase at all in your hands.

As for the repayment capacity, you can rest assured. If a default really occurs, Near East Development still has so many shareholders. You can go and collect the debt from anyone you don't like.

In short, just don't bully your nephew!"

Hudson said with a guilty conscience.

No one can predict what accidents may happen, and the time period can easily be hundreds of years, so the issue of repayment is not within his consideration at all.

What's the big deal if you can't pay back? There is a debt-to-equity swap in the world. If the bank doesn't develop smoothly, at worst, you can just pack up the Near East Development Bank and give it to the bears, which won't be considered a default.

...

"You two keep arguing over a few percentage points of interest, aren't you afraid of getting embarrassed if the news gets out?

Hudson, are you forgetting something?

Why can we only customize exclusive deposits for Big Bear, what about Benlong's?

Don't forget, this is a future Dragon King, who may even become the legendary Dragon Emperor, so the interest must be doubled!"

Bear Stearns' eyes changed when he saw Maxim coming to him, as if he was looking at a fool.

You want their interest, but they want your principal.

The credit is good, but the benefits of breach of contract are not great enough.

Based on his understanding of Hudson, if it really came to the point where it had to default, he would either have to find an impeccable reason to convince the creditors, or find a scapegoat who would attract hatred to take the blame.

"Okay, Bear Stearns, let's each make a concession. The annual interest rate is 3%, and the interest will be paid into your account on time every year.

Hudson spread his hands and revealed his cards.

As for the future, we can talk about it in the future. Only when the funding gap is filled can his huge interest-free loan be used normally.

It is not like now, when there is a large amount of funds available on the books, but people dare not move them at all, for fear that too many gold notes will be printed, causing the currency value to collapse.

The Jiaozi of the Song Dynasty and the Baochao of the Ming Dynasty are both negative examples. Even with the credit of the state, they could not withstand the over-issuance of currency, let alone with the support of a group of shareholders.

After this hole is absorbed, the Near East Development Bank will be able to pay dividends normally. It is not important how much money can be taken back, the key is to let shareholders see the return of money.

It's crazy to think about it. Others who traveled through time all developed industrialization, but he has been here for so many years and is still stuck in the agricultural age.

The greatest impact on the continent of Aslant was not the industrial revolution, but the financial revolution.

The Middle East Development Bank, which is seen by the outside world as financially strong, was actually a large-scale pyramid scheme company in the past.

The only difference is that there is a lack of competition and no regulation in the continent of Aslant. This inflated bubble now shows signs of a safe landing.

Hudson couldn't help but sigh: The difference between a liar and a genius is just a thought away.

He was forced to do this, because he is a nobleman! He can't revolutionize himself just to develop industry, right?

Even if there is any change, it will only be a top-down reform, not a destructive violent revolution.

Everything is for the development of armaments!

Connecting together everything Hudson has done in recent years, they all ultimately feed back into developing military strength.

Not only is he improving the military strength of his own territory, he is also dragging the nobles of the kingdom forward. Now it has become even more extraordinary, with the five-nation alliance all on the chariot together.

Everyone is rushing on the road of militarism, but the Alpha Kingdom's chariot is speeding faster.

It can almost be said that the armaments of a number of noble lords in the Near East and the Northern Frontier were initially completed with the support of Hudson.

If it weren't for the gold notes printed by the Near East Development Bank, which played the role of currency, the kingdom would still be in the crisis of money shortage, and there would be no current booming economy.

This is a virtuous cycle. Only with sufficient capital can we develop territory production. Only with the materials produced by the territory can we have the foundation for developing armaments.

The loaned money was not wasted. After circulating in the market, the kingdom had added large tracts of farmland and pastures.

Part of the materials produced were used to repay loans, and part were converted into military strength.

This transformation has just begun and will take time to develop.

It's all because of that damn sense of security. Hudson has been in a panic ever since he learned about the disaster that would last for thousands of years.

Knowing that it would be difficult to resist unknown risks on his own, he began to pull people aboard.

The situation changed as the chariot was being pulled. As more and more people were on board, more and more things needed Hudson to take care of.

The chaotic development has resulted in the freak Near East Development Bank. Even the unscientific international organization, the Five-Nation Alliance, is a byproduct of Hudson's series of operations.

If there had not been the strategic preparations in the early stages and the international situation had changed suddenly, the countries in the Central Continent would never have joined forces with the countries in the Northern Continent.

Everything is moving in a good direction, except for Hudson himself who has to work hard to fill the gaps for the Middle East Development Bank.

There is no way. The development of the Alpha Kingdom has just got on the right track, and this financial nuclear bomb must not explode now.

In order to improve the market credibility of gold notes, Hudson even forced customers to use gold notes to settle purchases of Ha's magic potions.

If someone checked the bank's accounts, they would be surprised to find that Hudson, the major shareholder, was the bank's largest depositor and also its largest loan client.

There are large deposits and huge loans. People who don't understand finance will be confused when they see them.

Chapter 213: The End of an Era

...

During his term as Pope, the Church of Dawn was divided into three parts. Such dark history is enough to be recorded in history books and used as a negative example forever.

With the Frankish Church alone, Pope Pius VII could still struggle for a while. Maybe one day something unexpected happened and the Frankish Kingdom declined, and the Church could reunify it.

"Nothing can be done about it"!

The most important thing is that no one was killed!

If you leave a way out when doing things, the backlash from the Vatican will not be so strong.

The Holy See is already at a disadvantage in international competition. If it were to fight with the Five-Nation Alliance, wouldn't the losses be even greater?

The battle on the prairie was no secret to the Church. Perhaps the Five Nations Alliance alone was no match for the Church, but when the five nations came together, the situation changed.

Due to geographical factors, it would be difficult for the Holy See to find allies to deal with the Five-Nation Alliance unless it joined forces with other races.

Colluding secretly was already the limit. Joining hands with alien races openly was beyond the tolerance of the Church.

Even though the Church is corrupt, there are still many passionate people inside. If they dare to betray the human race, a civil war will probably break out.

At the very least, the group of devout monks will stand against them; the passionate young people below will not agree either.

You must know that the Lord of Dawn is the racial god of the human race. Once he betrays the human race, he is betraying his faith.

"Your Majesty, we have no choice. If we let go now, we can still get away with it. If the Church continues to drag it out, it will only suffer greater losses.

"Your Majesty, Bishop Soren is right. We really have no choice now.

If the matter is really dealt with seriously, none of the Vatican's high-ranking officials present will be able to escape unscathed.

The declining Kingdom of Ruthenia unfortunately became a victim.

...

Xinyue Port became more prosperous after the grassland war. The shops and properties in the city were snatched by merchants from all over the continent.

"Duke, our territory has advanced to the Cursed Land, which is considered an ominous place by the orcs.

Jacob said with a serious look.

The nobles of the kingdom decided to increase investment in the Near East, and Snow Moon Territory has already taken steps to expand. With Hudson's reputation, the nearby orc tribes have already fled.

There is no way, the Behemoth royal family is the best negative example. Because they are too close to Master Hudson, the expedition team took special care of them when they returned.

Almost every Behemoth tribe with more than 10,000 people that stopped in place was taken care of by Master Hudson. The Behemoth royal family, which had already been seriously injured, now had its wounds inflamed.

The symbolic development was not to guard against orcs, but out of concern that the kingdom's nobles would jump out and grab the territory.

"Mysterious murals", "stone statues", "messages from ancient times", "a catastrophe of ten thousand years"...

Chapter 214: Excavation of Relics

The pace of expansion stopped, and Xueyue Territory gradually turned to digestion. Rows of farmland appeared continuously in the planning map.

Revisiting the old place and looking at the lush grasslands, it is hard to remember that this is a cursed land.

It's not Hudson who is causing trouble, it's really a professional matter that requires a professional team to handle.

If a little holy water could solve the problem, the orcs would have solved it long ago and would never have let the trouble last until now.

Leaving such a large cursed land at one's doorstep is itself a hidden danger.

It would be fine in normal times, but when the great catastrophe of ten thousand years is approaching, if we don't find out the truth of the matter, who knows if this is a bomb!

Times have changed.

In the past, inviting a group of "heretics" into a territory would result in social death due to external criticism.

The Northern Church in the new era adheres to the idea of tolerance and inclusiveness.
