Blake suggested.

If it were ten years ago, he would never have proposed such a meaningless plan, but times have changed.

The speed of the Church's decline is already visible to the naked eye. If nothing is done, the Church's foundation will probably be destroyed in the hands of this generation.

Even if it was a political show, the Church had to do it now. Finding out the ins and outs of the Ten Thousand Years' Disaster would at least allow them to boast in propaganda that they had made a contribution to the safety of the human race.

Compared with the risk of stepping forward and turning the tide in times of crisis, the effort of searching for the ruins is really not worth mentioning.

"Blake, you think too simply. If the catastrophe of ten thousand years was easy to figure out, our ancestors would have solved it long ago.

In fact, during the heyday of the Vatican, they sent people to investigate. Unfortunately, they almost turned the continent upside down, but still couldn't find what they wanted.

Judging from the investigation, it seems that someone deliberately erased this history and does not want future generations to know the truth.

Ten thousand years ago, the overlords of the continent were the orcs, and our human race was just an ordinary small tribe in the continent of Aslant. Our rise happened after the catastrophe.

If the major clans at that time wanted to erase this history, our ancestors would be powerless to stop them. In order to continue their race, they even had to actively cooperate.

In fact, the information in the possession of the Holy See also contains information about the Ten Thousand Years' Disaster. However, the ancestors who secretly recorded this information did not know much about it and only mentioned it in a few vague words.

As for the truth about the Ten Thousand Years' Tribulation, our ancestors actually didn't know it either. They were passive participants from the beginning to the end, and it ended in a muddled way.

In order to avoid causing panic, the Pope at the time ordered the news to be blocked, so in the eyes of the outside world, the ten thousand year catastrophe has always been a myth!

Things are not over yet. We later killed several alien races in an attempt to find out the truth, but unfortunately they didn't know much either.

Currently on the mainland, the only people who might know the truth are the elves and the dragons who have fled overseas!"

After listening to Pius VII's explanation, everyone was dumbfounded. After all this time, it turned out that the existence of the Ten Thousand Years' Disaster was not a secret at all.

Since the Holy See knows about it, then some of the ancient and powerful forces in the southern continent may also know about it.

The only countries that have truly been kept in the dark are the newly emerged nations that have risen in the last few hundred years. What the Alpha Kingdom is doing now is merely breaking this window paper.

"Your Majesty, the Alphas said that the catastrophe of ten thousand years is imminent. Could it be that they have made some new discoveries?

Although I don't know what the Great Tribulation is, the decline of the continent's overlords almost always started with the Great Tribulation, so it is worth our attention! "

Commander Gu Lei on the side spoke up.

Reason is something that requires a prerequisite. Before the decline of the Church, everyone was busy fighting for power and various internal struggles.

Now that he was under pressure from external forces, Pius VII no longer cared about playing political balance, and the various factions were too lazy to continue.

When it comes to interests, they will fight as they should, but as long as their own interests are not involved, the various factions have stopped hindering each other.

No one knows whether they can reverse the decline of the Holy See, but they have begun to save themselves.

This is almost an instinctive reaction of the rulers. No matter how corrupt a regime is, at the critical moment of life and death, there will be people who will take measures to try to turn the tide.

"This is indeed a trouble, but the truth of this matter is still debatable.

Send someone to keep an eye on the Alpha Kingdom. If they are frantically expanding their military and preparing for war, and they don't use their troops against the orcs, then it proves that the news is true, and we will follow up immediately!"

Pius VII thought for a moment and said.

It was a perfect response plan, with almost no flaws. Apparently, Pius VII, who had been in charge of the Vatican for many years, was still qualified in political tactics.

...

Similar scenes were constantly played out in all the major forces. Caesar IV's prank only frightened a group of small and medium forces, while the top forces of the human race still performed very steadily.

This stability comes not only from information asymmetry, but also from confidence in strength.

The orcs, who were once the overlords of the continent, gradually declined after the catastrophe. The current strength of the human race is no worse than they were back then.

Because of the single race, in terms of comprehensive racial strength, it is actually stronger.

Everyone is now focusing their attention on the Alpha Kingdom, and the international situation is slowly changing.

The Kingdom of Avarat.

With the old king's death, Elton VIII, who was in his early forties, ascended the throne with the support of a group of nobles.

Unlike his father who is a play-acting man, the young and promising Crown Prince Elton has always been regarded by all parties in the country as the hope of the kingdom.

Elton VIII did not disappoint everyone. As soon as he ascended the throne, he appointed the reformist leader Duke of Grenafan as prime minister, thus starting the kingdom's road to reform.

There is no doubt that any reform comes at a price, and the Kingdom of Avarat is no exception.

However, this is a matter for the future. At this moment, the nobles of the Kingdom of Avarat still have high hopes for this reform.

As a vested interest group, no one wants the kingdom to be stronger than them, especially when their neighbors are becoming increasingly powerful while they themselves are being stable and retreating.

"Reform to strengthen the country" won the support of nobles from all sides, including the conservative nobles, who also hoped that the kingdom could reverse its decline through reform.

"Your Majesty, the opportunity has come to you!"

Duke Grenafan said excitedly.

For politicians, the truth or falsity of news is not important; what matters is whether it is needed.

There is no doubt that the news of the "imminent catastrophe" is a good medicine for the reformers.

The more class-bound a world is, the more difficult it is to reform. Even if all parties hope that the kingdom will become stronger, once their own interests are affected, supporters can turn into opponents.

As the leader of the reformists, Duke Grenafan sorted out the situation of the kingdom in full, but could not find a suitable entry point to start the road to reform.

Originally, he was prepared to make an excuse to force the reform, but he didn't expect that at the critical moment, the Alpha people gave them a stepping stone.

Needless to say, the imminent catastrophe must be true. Only if the news is true can the reformists gain the reputation of "righteousness".

"Then give it a try!

But Your Excellency the Duke, once this step is taken, the kingdom will have no way out.

The only countries that can truly be called powerful on the continent now are: the Frankish Kingdom, the Libyan Kingdom, and the Alpha Kingdom.

The Three Kingdoms also represent three political models. If a kingdom wants to successfully reform, it has to learn from the experiences of these three countries.

Currently, the three countries in the Central Continent and the Principality of Moshi are following the example of the Alpha Kingdom in politics and military affairs. The specific results are unknown, but the reputation of the Five-Nation Alliance has been established. "

It can be seen that in terms of the choice of political system, Elton VIII is more inclined to the Alpha model. There is no other reason, it is purely because it is more effective in military terms.

Following the path of the Frankish Kingdom and the Libyan Kingdom, it is unknown how many years it will take for the Kingdom of Avarat to become powerful.

But if you choose to follow the path of the Alpha Kingdom, it will only take a few years to build a large army with a certain level of combat effectiveness.

I can't guarantee anything else, but at least it can put the neighbors' prying eyes to rest.

In recent years, after a series of major wars, the assessment of the combat effectiveness of the Alpha Kingdom's army by the continental countries has been rising again and again.

Even though its economic strength was lagging behind, it still held its position as the third largest kingdom on the continent. Especially now that it had four allies, its reputation was at its peak.

"Your Majesty, I suggest that after the reform begins, we send a delegation to the three countries to study and learn.

After we understand the political system of the Three Kingdoms, we will combine it with the actual situation of the kingdom and choose a path that best suits us. "

Duke Grenafan said rather nervously.

The choice of political system is not only a choice of route, but also involves the interests of all parties.
Chapter 537:
Chapter 217: Reform

At the Emerald Palace, Hudson, who had arrived at the royal capital with a survey team, had not yet had time to make a summary report on the issue of the "Ten Thousand Years of Disaster" before he received news that an investigation team from the Kingdom of Avarat was coming.

Reform has never been a new term.

Not to mention the distant past, in recent years alone many countries have carried out internal reforms, some of which were successful, but more have failed.

For example: the already destroyed Warhammer Kingdom is the best negative example.

The political reforms induced by internal power struggles directly led to the division of the country, and then it was destroyed by foreign invasion.

A group of small countries in the northern continent are also representatives, but the reason for their failure is not the reform, but their own small size and too short a reform time.

They had just decided to learn from the Alpha Kingdom and carry out military system reform, but they were defeated in the continental war when they were halfway through the operation.

If they had reformed ten or eight years earlier, the current situation on the continent would have been very different. Perhaps they still could not stop the coalition forces of the elves and the ancient remnant alliance, but at least they could hold out for a little longer.

Unfortunately, there is no "if" in reality. Among the reforms hastily launched during the crisis, only the Principality of Moshi was successful.

However, the situation in the Principality of Moshi was special, and they were able to complete internal reforms entirely thanks to the great help of the orcs.

The original political and military systems were destroyed in the orc invasion.

During the war, the army was handed back to Hudson, who was deeply influenced by the Alpha Kingdom.

The subsequent reforms were entirely military reforms, which led to political changes.

In fact, the political system of the Alpha Kingdom is not very advanced. It is just that due to external pressure, the administrative efficiency has been passively improved.

At its core, they are all the same, using the feudal system. The only difference is that the regulations on military mobilization are stricter.

The remaining political structure and local management model are almost the same as those of other countries on the mainland.

The difference was not huge, and the vested interest groups suffered a heavy blow before the Principality of Moshi was able to complete its internal reforms.

Behind this is George's crazy money-making. Only with his strong financial resources could he pave the way for reform.

Similar operations are simply impossible for other countries to replicate.

Even if the nobles in the country are willing to support the reform, how can they compensate for the damaged interests of everyone?

The Principality of Moshi relied on inheriting the legacy of the Warhammer Kingdom, and the royal government spent a lot of money to quell the voices of opposition.

The reforms of the three countries in the Central Continent are not going very smoothly, including the advancement of military reforms, which are also facing many difficulties.

This is not a question of whether the nobles support it or not, but it involves their own interests and no one wants to suffer losses.

There was no grand scene of the reformists and conservatives fighting each other because there were foreign alliances watching them covetously.

"Your Majesty, the Kingdom of Avalat is really good at making excuses, isn't it?"

Hudson said helplessly.

With the addition of a lofty reason, the nature of the matter is completely different.

At the very least, if the Kingdom of Avarat wants to conduct an inspection, all countries must cooperate. The specific degree of cooperation depends on the situation, but on the surface, all countries must do a good job in related work.

"The catastrophe of ten thousand years is about to break out", it was spread from the Alpha Kingdom. When it comes to something like this involving human safety, there is more to do.

This is the power of justice!

"Marshal, perhaps the Kingdom of Avarat is just the beginning, and more countries will join in.

It doesn't matter whether the reform can be promoted or not, and it doesn't matter to them whether the news is true or not.

As long as the banner of justice is raised, those evil neighbors who are eyeing them must now restrain their minions.

If something goes too far, the criticism from within the human race can throw a large force into chaos.

Of course, the Kingdom of Avarat should really want to reform. I met Elton VIII when he traveled around the continent as the crown prince.

This man became famous at a young age. He accomplished several great things during his time as crown prince and enjoyed a very high reputation in the aristocratic circles of the Kingdom of Avarat.

This reform had been brewing for a long time within the Kingdom of Avarat, and most of the nobles were supportive.

I don't know whether it will succeed in the end, but it will definitely cause quite a stir.

If they succeed by chance, the situation in the southern continent will also be affected, which will be a good thing for the kingdom.

As for the political investigation, I hope you will all cooperate fully, as if it were paying off an old debt.

Over the past few hundred years, the kingdom has repeatedly encountered orc crises, and all the countries on the continent have contributed!"

Caesar IV spoke to comfort him.

It's not that Hudson is petty, it's mainly because the Kingdom of Avarat came here for inspection and directly requested to be able to communicate with him.

In name it was an exchange, but in reality he was just there to do the reception.

The reason is very realistic. The continent of Aslant is based on the military system, supplemented by the political system.

The core of reforms in various countries is often that military is more important than politics. Generally speaking, as long as the military strength is strong enough, it is the sign of a strong country.

In this regard, the Alpha Kingdom is one of the best and is well-known on the continent for its militarism.

As the founder of the new military system of the Alpha Kingdom, Hudson is undoubtedly a hot commodity.

If it weren't for the fact that his foundation in the Alpha Kingdom was so huge, no one would be able to offer a price, and the people who came to poach him would be able to fill the palace.

If you can't poach people, it's also good to have some communication.

The "celebrity effect" is applicable everywhere.

Especially when it comes to such a major reform, if we don't get a few big names to endorse it, how will we convince the opposition when we return?

"Your Majesty, I'm afraid the reforms of the Kingdom of Avarat will not go smoothly.

Apart from our willingness to support them, I guess only the Vatican hopes that they can rise from the ashes and muddy the waters of the southern continent.

The Yin Libya Kingdom, which has long been eyeing them, will definitely jump out to cause trouble. If this reform goes wrong, it may even accelerate their fall!"

Prime Minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland said worriedly.

If the reforms of the Kingdom of Avarat backfire, the wave of annexation in the southern continent will be further intensified.

This kind of situation where the strong always get stronger is not what the Alpha Kingdom wants to see.

The human nations annexed each other, and their strength grew immediately, unlike the Alpha Kingdom which was suffering.

Even if the Near East strategy progresses smoothly, it will take a lot of time to accumulate the kingdom's comprehensive national strength.

"Prime Minister, there is nothing wrong with reform. The Kingdom of Avarat has fallen to this point today because of internal conservatism.

If we don't carry out comprehensive reforms, we will just wait for death. Instead of waiting for death, we should take action while we still have the chips in our hands.

There is no need for a thorough reform, as long as the administrative efficiency and military system are improved, they will be able to protect themselves in troubled times!"

Marquis Delgado immediately retorted.

The success or failure of the reform of the Kingdom of Avarat had little to do with him, but as the kingdom's finance minister, Marquis Delgado passively became a reformer.

Everything is driven by money. If we want to reverse the financial predicament, fiscal and taxation revenue reform is imperative.

But this is extremely difficult. The Alpha Kingdom operates a tax-farming system, and any move is bound to affect the interests of a number of nobles. It is simply not something that he, a finance minister, can promote.

If he can't do it himself, he has to build momentum. No matter which country wants to reform, he is now supportive.

As long as the spring breeze of reform blows, the Alpha Kingdom will inevitably be affected.

While other countries are carrying out drastic and comprehensive reforms, he merely wants to reform the fiscal and taxation collection model, which is not worth mentioning at all.

In this regard, Caesar IV was his greatest supporter.

Unfortunately, apart from the king, few ministers in the court supported him.

It's not that everyone doesn't know that direct taxation can significantly increase the government's fiscal revenue and increase the central government's control over local governments.

The problem is that the knife cut into my own body!

The important officials in the court were also great nobles, and all of them were beneficiaries of the tax farming system. Once the tax reform was carried out, the families behind them would be severely slaughtered.

This kind of unforgettable pain is not something that ordinary people can bear. If it was a critical moment for the kingdom, for the sake of the overall situation, maybe everyone would have gritted their teeth and agreed.

The current Alpha Kingdom is obviously not at that stage. Except for the relatively poor government, the whole kingdom is thriving.

Even the old enemy, the orcs, were trampled underfoot at this moment. It can be said that the Alpha Kingdom is now at its most prosperous time since its founding.

It's not that there is insufficient motivation for reform, but that there is absolutely no motivation for reform.

It's useless to explain it with reason or appeal to its emotions.

It's just that the government is a little poor, and no one takes it seriously at all.

On the issue of the kingdom's fiscal and tax reforms, Hudson chose to remain neutral.

If everyone agrees, he can also give up the tax-inclusive part of the benefits. After all, the Snow Moon Territory is currently tax-free, and most areas of the Mountain Territory are not on the kingdom map.

All parties insisted on opposing it, and Hudson would not choose to go against the trend.

The nobles' first choice is to protect themselves, rather than putting themselves in opposition to interest groups for the benefit of the kingdom.

Of course, he did not do nothing. At least when the Chancellors of the Exchequer attacked him, he stood up and spoke fair words.

This kind of implicit support also plays a significant role.

In addition, Marquis Delgado's reforms were indeed made out of public interest and were merely a political idea that had not been put into practice, and had not yet reached the point of a fight to the death.

This saved his position as Chancellor of the Exchequer.

Otherwise, with the king's support alone, Marquis Delgado would have been sent back home long ago.

After all, Caesar IV was not a strong monarch. Almost every time his ministers agreed, he gave in.

"Everyone, there is no need to dwell on this issue. The affairs of the Kingdom of Avarat will be decided by the people of Avarat themselves.

Even if we wanted to interfere, it would be beyond our reach.

Rather than being a bad guy who gets no thanks, it is better to just stand by and watch and wait for the situation to develop!"

Hudson said with a smile.

He also put a lot of thought into maintaining the stability of the court.

He also felt very powerless against the political sensitivity of the Marquis Delgado. It cannot be said that there was none at all, but there really was not much.

If he had not been good at financial management and able to divert the kingdom's financial black hole, he would have been driven out of office long ago.

This was undoubtedly not what Hudson wanted to see. Once the Chancellor of the Exchequer left office, a gap opened up in the court.

As a king, Caesar IV could not allow these old guys to be active in front of him forever. Once he seized the opportunity, he would definitely place his own people there.

The new and old factions will directly enter the court, and party strife will become the main theme in the future.

This was definitely a disaster for the booming Alpha Kingdom.

Deep down, Hudson knew very well that this would happen sooner or later.

"A new emperor chooses new ministers!"

No matter how much Caesar IV could tolerate, there was a limit. As a monarch, how could he tolerate power falling into someone else's hands for so long?

Perhaps all the ministers in the court performed well and were loyal, but these were secondary factors in the face of power.

The gap between an "assistant minister" and a "powerful minister" often occurs in the moment when the monarch grows up.

But the ministers also had no choice but to climb to their current positions, and they all lived not just for themselves.

The interest groups behind them would not allow them to retreat, even when facing the king.

Hudson insisted on not entering the court because he didn't want to be controlled by interest groups. Even though he was far away in the frontier, he was still surrounded by a large group of people who pushed him to "advance".

Hudson vaguely suspected that Caesar IV supported the reformers not to promote reform, but to open a loophole in the court.

The end of one topic often marks the beginning of another.

It's a pity that Hudson guessed wrong this time. Everyone's curiosity about the ten thousand year catastrophe was not as strong as he expected.

Perhaps because it seems too far away from real life, everyone's attention to it is very limited.

I briefly described the basic situation, and the response I got was: So that's it!

And then there was nothing else. On this issue, all politicians were very flexible.

The countries on the continent were watching the reaction of the Alpha Kingdom, while the kingdom's top leaders chose to watch the reaction of the elves.

One thing leads to another, and everyone is a smart person.

It would be fine if we didn't know, but now that we know the existence of the "Ten Thousand Years' Disaster", we naturally cannot just sit there and wait for death.

If you have no experience in dealing with it, then learn from those who have experience. Even if you make a wrong judgment, it will be bad luck for everyone.

After leaving the palace, Hudson's head was buzzing.

Today's incident taught him a lesson. The political wisdom of the indigenous people should not be underestimated.

Especially when it comes to experience, the performance is outstanding.

If you don't understand the situation, don't delve into it. Just follow the experienced people and copy their homework.

No matter how the alien races block the news, just follow their lead and learn from them. Large-scale preparations for war cannot be hidden anyway.

...

The Alpha Kingdom was out of reach and chose to stand by and watch, but the situation on the continent was still triggered.

The Kingdom of Avarat is not the only country that is in a stage of decline and needs to rely on reforms to survive.

In the past, no one took action because they had too many concerns and were worried that the failure of reform would make the situation worse.

Some of these countries have even reformed once, but ended in failure.

Now stimulated by this, people of insight in various countries have taken action again.

Reform may not necessarily change a country's destiny, but not reforming will definitely lead to its downfall.

Although the nobles may not be doomed by a change of dynasty, their original interests will most likely shrink.

The older generation seeks stability, but the younger generation has long been unable to hold back and has begun to call for reform.

For a time, the entire continent was filled with calls for reform, including within several major human countries, where people were clamoring to reform domestic injustice.

The Kingdom of Libya.

Their neighbor, whom they regarded as a meal, suddenly wanted to reform and sent an inspection team with great fanfare. Naturally, King Bordeaux VIII had to pay close attention.

"What exactly is going on?

The new king has just ascended the throne. How dare the Kingdom of Avarat reform at this time? "

Bordeaux VIII asked with concern.

"Reform" is not a trivial matter in any country.

Under normal circumstances, when a power change occurs, the first thing the new ruler should do is to consolidate his power, rather than the so-called reform.

If the reform fails, it will be a political accident for the new monarch whose power is not yet consolidated.

"Your Majesty, the Kingdom of Avarat actually has no choice. It's not that the new monarch chose to reform, but their internal problems can no longer be suppressed.

There is still a glimmer of hope for reform at this moment. If it continues to be delayed, by the time all parties reach a balance again, there will be no room for reform later."

Foreign Secretary Lord Midford explained.

The political reforms in all countries are similar, usually "forced", and the Kingdom of Avarat is no exception.

The young people who support the new king are eager to change the status quo and have long been unable to hold back. As a king, he cannot act on his own.

He simply took the reform as an opportunity to carry out a major reshuffle of the court.

After all, the new emperor is already in his forties and his team has already been established.

"Um!

Looking at it this way, it does make sense.

King Elton VIII and Duke Grenafan are not ordinary people. If they join forces, they might be able to achieve some results.

His hero is my enemy.

Although we are not at a life-and-death battle with the Kingdom of Avarat, the conflict between the two sides has long been buried deep. For the sake of the kingdom's strategy, it is best for the Kingdom of Avarat not to revive!"

Bordeaux VIII said murderously.

Geopolitics is often the most unsolvable problem. Strategic conflicts determine that the Kingdom of Libya must prevent the rise of its neighbors.

"Your Majesty, all eyes are on the Kingdom of Avarat right now, so we should not act rashly for the time being.

If something goes wrong and is brought to the Human Alliance Parliament for discussion, it will be very detrimental to our international image.

Moreover, this kind of political reform may cause rebellious psychology if too much external intervention is involved, which will promote the internal unity of the Kingdom of Avarat.

It would be a good idea to wait and see how their reforms go, find a suitable entry point, and then deal them a fatal blow.

Maybe we don't have to do anything, because they have led themselves down a path of no return in the process of reform!"

Prime Minister Marquis Olmos said with a sneer.

Chapter 218: Deep in Debt

After the meeting in the capital, Hudson returned directly to the territory. The turmoil in the international arena was just a topic of conversation in the daily lives of the nobles in the kingdom.

Since the end of the continental war, the human world has been split into two worlds. The political changes in the southern continent will certainly have far-reaching impacts, but for now, it is enough for the kingdom to take care of the Five Nations Alliance.

"News of a catastrophe that will happen in a thousand years." After a brief moment of tension, everyone went back to doing what they were supposed to do.

Anyway, the Alpha Kingdom is preparing for war on a daily basis. If a major disaster occurs, they will respond to it. If no disaster occurs, they will fight the orcs. This will surely not be in vain.

Seeing the positive work attitude of the Kingdom's top brass, Hudson really couldn't find anything to complain about. As for the countries on the continent, let everything take its course!

After several years of development, Xueyue Territory has also undergone earth-shaking changes. Standing above the territory again, the lush grassland that was originally there has now turned into farmland.

In addition to the efforts of the subjects, the Kingdom's Magician Corps also played an important role in bringing about these earth-shaking changes.

Hudson was the first in history to use the magician corps as a pioneering corps without causing a strong backlash.

If you look closely, you can see that there are magicians below who are working with the serfs to transform the river channel.

The reason why the wizards work so hard is that Master Hudson has given them too much.

It seems that a lot of time is spent on working, but in fact, everyone's cultivation speed is faster than before.

There is no way, the potion that assists in cultivation is just too fragrant.

Unfortunately, this thing is exclusively monopolized and is expensive. Under normal circumstances, ordinary magicians like them cannot get a purchase quota.

If you want to get potions to assist in cultivation, the only way, besides spending a lot of money, is to come here to work.

Generally speaking, the magicians who work for Hudson can practice 50% faster than those who practice hard on their own.

If you have a special skill, you can get more auxiliary potions and your training speed can even be increased several times.

This account is easy to calculate. The faster your cultivation level improves, the more free time you have, and the greater the probability of a breakthrough in the future.

The arrogant magic masters were also unable to resist the temptation of rapid improvement in their cultivation. As a result, members of the Kingdom Magicians stationed at the border often sneaked into Master Hudson's territory to take private jobs.

They are mainly earth magicians and water magicians. Due to the nature of their profession, they can take the most orders.

Under normal circumstances, these two types of magicians cannot be found in the Mage Corps' headquarters.

Not only magicians who are in service often stay in Xueyue Territory, but even after completing their service mission, many magicians also choose to stay.

At this moment, Snow Moon Territory has become the most popular place for magicians, and the number of magicians staying there even exceeds that of the royal capital.

However, this was just the beginning. As time went on, not only did the magicians from the Alpha Kingdom spontaneously gather in the Snow Moon Territory, but even the magicians from the Principality of Moshi had their eyes on this land.

The influx of a large number of magicians has also spawned many related industries. Magic potions, magic equipment, magic materials... a series of industrial chains serving magicians are constantly developing and improving.

If nothing unexpected happens, with the continued development of Xueyue Territory, this talent siphoning effect will continue to spread to the outside world.

Unfortunately, those who can learn magic these days are not ordinary people, and they are also tied to family ties, so it is difficult to be truly recruited.

However, this kind of regret mainly exists among the high-level officials of the territory and the members of the Koslo family. Hudson has never had such feelings.

Having experienced the impact of the information age, Hudson doesn't care whether these workers are willing to come over and pledge allegiance to him. As long as they can complete the task, that's enough.

Direct equal exchange, no one owes anyone anything. If you can cooperate, then cooperate. If you can't cooperate, then forget it. No one needs to bear any responsibilities or obligations to each other.

Hudson was not prepared to fight a civil war. If a war broke out, it would be directed against foreign races.

With the racial justice in mind, we can directly recruit the magicians in the territory to join the war. After rounding off, these people are also the military force of Xueyue Territory.

Hudson felt refreshed after letting Maxim circle the sky twice. These were the territories he had conquered, and he had changed the land in just a few years.

If there had been so many workers joining in when the mountain territory was being developed, it definitely wouldn't have been so difficult.

But there was no way around it. When the mountain territory was being developed, Hudson had just started to make a name for himself and did not have the ability to be high-profile.

It's not like now, when he is a local lord, even though he has the title of the continent's number one potion master and is making a high-profile move in the magic world, no one is watching him.

...

"Duke, I'm afraid we should consider relocating the political center!

With the rapid development of Snow Moon Territory, Crescent Harbor has become too crowded and is no longer suitable to continue serving as the administrative center of the territory.

There are two options now. One is to choose a suitable location in the middle of the territory and rebuild a city as our new administrative center to strengthen control over the territory.

The second option is to take into account the future development of the territory. The best option now is to use a city in the eastern part of the territory as a temporary administrative center to prepare for the subsequent eastward strategy.

Both options have their own advantages and disadvantages. Judging from the current situation in the territory, no matter which option is chosen, it is better than staying in Crescent Harbor.

In order to divert ships, the Ministry of Government is considering selecting suitable locations in coastal areas and planning three medium-sized cargo ports.

..."

After listening to Jacob's report, Hudson was slightly stunned. Crescent Harbor's special geographical location meant that its economy was definitely first-rate, but as an administrative center of the territory, it was obviously far behind.

The reason why they chose to establish their base here was mainly due to strategic security considerations. With the convenience of being close to the sea, they could evacuate from the sea at any time if the situation became critical.

However, the times are changing. No one could have imagined that the offensive and defensive situation between the Kingdom and the Orcs could be reversed in just a few years.

After hearing the noise, some of the nearby Pigs came over, but they were not there to help, but were being chased by the enemy.

With a bunch of pig teammates, the Pig Chieftain not only failed to escape the crisis in the battle, but became more and more dangerous.

Almost in the blink of an eye, the Pigs on the left wing fell on the battlefield, exposing the backs of the Pigs who were huddled together to the enemy.

"Glem, just wait for me. After I get out of here this time, I'm..."

To get revenge, you must be able to get out alive. Although this is a place of testing, if you die here, you will really die.

When it comes to racial inheritance, the more noble one's status, the more they must participate. Otherwise, if racial inheritance falls into the hands of outsiders, their supreme status will definitely be impacted.

In order to participate in this operation, Chief Pig also brainwashed a group of geniuses in the tribe, requiring them to protect the young chief at all costs.

As for whether it is inherited or not, no Pig in the history of the Pig tribe has ever been able to obtain it.

Out of his emphasis on power, Chief Pig still sent his son in. It is better to be safe than sorry.

There have been many lucky people in the past, and no one can guarantee that the orcs will not suddenly take over the Pig tribe.

If he really got the inheritance by chance, but it fell into the hands of other pigs, his position as the patriarch would be in danger.

Abandoning a patriarch for the sake of racial development is not a new thing in the Orc Empire.

No matter how much he planned, he still didn't expect that the well-behaved and obedient Gram would become like a different person after entering the holy land of inheritance.

Similar scenes are still happening constantly in the holy land of inheritance.

In the face of life and death crisis, animal nature cannot stand the test!
Chapter 541:
Chapter 221: Investigation Team

"The light of inheritance has appeared!"

Someone shouted, and all the orcs abandoned their opponents and ran straight towards the column of light.

Unfortunately, once you enter the inheritance light column, you can't continue to attack. If you can attack in the inheritance, it will become a fight to the last 100 people.

It's not that the Beast God is deliberately making things difficult for his believers, it's just that there is a threshold to inheritance.

The outside world all thought it was the inheritance of the Beast God, but in fact the holy land of inheritance was only to activate the memories hidden deep in their blood.

For the orcs who successfully obtained the inheritance, their subsequent training went smoothly, and a large part of the reason was that they activated the racial bloodline.

Since it involves activating blood, there is naturally a probability of failure.

Especially for the new mixed-race races, with multiple bloodlines mixed together in their bodies, it increases the difficulty of awakening.

In the illusion, Graem is a happy golden pig.

Every day he basked in the sunshine, ran freely on the grass, and lived a carefree life until disaster struck.

Countless demons rushed out from the abyss. In order to avoid becoming food, countless companions fought back, but they were still unable to resist the fall of their homes.

Gram also joined the resistance army and fought against the demons together with countless of his fellow tribesmen.

He learned a lot during the battle, and his strength increased all the way, and he finally became a strong man in the tribe.

Graham, who holds great power, did not slack off and continued to practice every day.

The decisive battle finally began. During the battle, Gram soared into the sky, broke through the sanctuary, and began to kill everyone.

Life ends, the dream ends!

Graham took a while to sort out the disjointed memories in his dream.

"So this is the inheritance!"

The strength in the dream was not brought out, but the accumulated experience in cultivation and interpersonal relationships were all brought out.

The skin that was originally only slightly golden yellow now turned completely golden yellow. From a distance, it looked like a lump of gold.

"Golden Pig!"

Or the golden pig!

Similar scenes are constantly played out in the holy land of inheritance. The successful ones smile with joy, while the failed ones cry loudly, showing all kinds of life.

The high-ranking officials of the Orc Empire who were waiting anxiously outside were also panicking at the moment, fearing that their race would gain nothing this time.

On the contrary, some weak races were extremely calm. If there weren't so many elders present, they would have gone back to sleep.

Within the Orc Empire, the various tribes are divided into different levels in addition to being classified according to their strength. They can also be divided into different levels based on the number of times they have obtained inheritance and the number of people.

Over thousands of years, they have acquired the most inheritance and have long been at the top of the empire's food chain, but now they have declined.

Even the inheritance of the Beast God cannot stop the rise and fall of a race.

Compared to most declining races, the Behemoths were still lucky. Having fallen from the royal family to the royal family, at least they were still in the ruling group.

Seeing countless points of light flashing by, the Bear King spoke first and said, "The transmission has begun, it seems that the inheritance is about to end.

According to the practice of the Orc Empire, they were naturally ready to start fighting. However, the situation this time was special. They had just been beaten up by Hudson and his men, and now everyone was still feeling remorseful.

At this moment, "invading the Alpha Kingdom" is obviously not a good choice. Even if the opponent's sanctuary cannot take action, they can still play tricks!

If the Alpha Kingdom initiates the war first, they can still ask for help from the Anti-Human Alliance; if they take the initiative to initiate the war, they will have to bear the consequences themselves.

In fact, this restrictive rule was prepared for the Orc Empire from the beginning.

In the past years, the Orc Empire had unilaterally provoked wars and dragged the Alliance into the war more than once, making all parties very angry, and they specially made a patch when renewing the alliance.

The right to act independently is satisfied, but the resulting series of consequences must also be borne by oneself.

The last time the Orc Empire failed in its invasion of the human race, it was beaten all the way by the Human Alliance, and there was no sign of any alien alliance stepping forward, it was all because of this supplementary agreement.

After suffering a great loss, the orcs have learned their lesson. They did not start fighting right away, but discussed with an attitude of negotiation.

"Emperor Xiong, I think we should take this opportunity to get rid of some of the bad habits we have in the past. Fighting and killing all day long is not conducive to the unity of the empire.

We are all peace-loving races. Humanity is now powerful, and there are rumors in the outside world that a catastrophe of ten thousand years is approaching. Why don't we jointly issue a "Twenty-Year Truce Order"?

For the safety of the empire's outstanding talents, from now on, it is forbidden to hunt down and kill the talented children of all races, especially those who have inherited the legacy! "

The Silver Moon Wolf King's smiling proposal confused the elders of various tribes present, and many of them doubted their ears.

"We have become a peace-loving race?"

To say that all orcs are warlike is certainly an exaggeration, but to say that half of the orcs are warlike is definitely not the full story.

"Peace-loving" is nonsense, but it is an indisputable fact that the Orc Empire needs peace now.

The current situations of all ethnic groups are similar. They are all in a state of exhaustion and in urgent need of rest and recuperation.

"What the Wolf King said makes sense. Now is not the right time to continue the internal struggle. If we launch a foreign war, we won't even be able to raise strategic materials.

Let's be patient for 20 years, and when our strength is restored, we will fight a decisive battle with the Alpha Kingdom!"

The Lion King echoed.

The Lion Emperor had no choice but to change from a war advocate to a peace advocate. If the orc empire continues to struggle, it will destroy itself.

We have just obtained the inheritance. It will be impossible to transform it into racial strength without more than ten or twenty years.

"If everyone has no objection, then it's settled!"

After glancing at everyone, the Bear King said with a serious face.

The seemingly ordinary conversation actually revealed the power shift in the Orc Empire. It was supposed to be a discussion between the four royal families, but now it became a discussion between the three royal families.

The Eagle Royal Family, which suffered heavy losses, has now lost its voice. If it weren't for the special nature of their race, they wouldn't even be able to keep their royal position.

The royal status has been barely preserved, and when it is time to keep a low profile, you must keep a low profile.

But when it comes to politics, what you say has absolutely nothing to do with what you actually do.

The Twenty-Year Truce can limit the outbreak of major wars, but it cannot prevent minor conflicts.

The Orc Empire is so vast that neither the royal family nor the kings have the ability to expand their influence to every corner.

The so-called management is also a rough and unification in name only. The management of the tribes within the sphere of influence is basically laissez-faire.

It is normal for tribal chiefs, who have a high degree of autonomy, to occasionally fight with their neighbors.

Even among different tribes of the same ethnic group, there are many cases of fighting over interests.

"It is forbidden to hunt down geniuses of all races" is even more ridiculous. Who would bring up this kind of behavior of betraying teammates openly?

Anything that happens in secret can be regarded as non-existent as long as it is not caught on the spot.

As soon as the words were spoken, representatives of all ethnic groups at the scene were all overjoyed. Regardless of the execution, having rules and restrictions is better than having none.

Especially for some weak races, these restrictions are too necessary. Hunting geniuses has little to do with them. Weak chickens who have never obtained inheritance are not even qualified to be targeted by the big races.

They can actually enjoy the benefits of the "truce".

"My dear emperors and kings, if the empire is not prepared to launch a foreign war, then the border defense will have to change.

In order to be fair, I propose a rotation system, whereby the strong fighting races take turns guarding the border.

Considering the political impact, the royal family that holds the power of the empire should not appear on the border, so as not to provoke the human race and lead to escalation of conflicts! "

King Behemoth's righteous words made the representatives of many races feel heartbroken.

In the past, "guarding the border" in the area bordering the human race was a very lucrative job.

Whether participating in smuggling trade or waiting for an opportunity to enter human territory to plunder, you can make a fortune.

The situation now is obviously different. The smuggling trade route has shifted to the sea; and with the fierce Hudson in the Near East, who dares to cause trouble there?

The Behemoths stayed on the border for several years, and they only sent their cavalry to symbolically penetrate into areas where the enemy's forces were weak and conduct armed marches.

There has never been any substantial large-scale military operation, for fear of provoking the great devil Ha.

Even though they were so obedient, they still couldn't escape the clutches of the Demon King. The Behemoth tribe near Xueyue Territory was all beaten by the Demon King.

The frightened Behemoths hurriedly moved away from this evil neighbor.

The royal family and the kingly family don't want to be neighbors with the Hudson Devil, and these races don't want to do that even more.

The fact that there is no orc tribe with a population of over 10,000 within 300 miles of Xueyue Territory is enough to explain many problems.

Even though Hudson didn't do anything to them and didn't launch any military operations, everyone still instinctively chose to stay away.

"King Behemoth's proposal is very practical. The Alphas have been very restless recently and really need a strong race to guard them.

I think we should have the boarmen, hyenamen, and minotaurs guard the place for ten years, and then we can arrange for rotations!"

The Eagle King on the side said.

I have no say in major decisions, but I have to make my presence felt in small decisions like this.

The three tribes that were named can only count themselves unlucky.

The reason they were unfortunately selected was mainly because of their good fighting ability and high fertility rate.

Especially since boarmen and hyenamen give birth to large litters of cubs, it is perfect for them to exchange lives with humans.

In an era when the strength of various races was greatly weakened, these middle-class races with relatively intact strength became unstable elements in the empire.

The seven clans united to rebel against the upper royal family. It happened once, and that was enough! Neither the seven royal families nor the four royal families wanted it to happen again.

"Your Majesty the Eagle King, our strength is limited, and I'm afraid we can't handle it..."

Before the boarman chief could finish his words, he was forced back by the murderous gazes of the emperors and kings.

"Oh... Your Majesties, rest assured, we will definitely... complete the border defense... mission..."

The boarman chieftain knew the situation and changed his words in time, successfully defusing a life-and-death crisis.

Killing the chicken to scare the monkey did not happen, but the effect was achieved first. The other two tribes who originally wanted to speak out in opposition hurriedly bit the bullet and accepted the task.

...

"Your Highness, ahead is the first city in the Northern Continent-Canglan City.

According to legend, this city has existed for eight hundred years. It was first built in the era of the Empire of Light and was once the front line against the invasion of orcs.

Thanks to the efforts of human ancestors, the new border between the Alpha Kingdom and the Orc Empire was established.

..."

After listening to his subordinates' introduction, Prince Peter's eyes lit up.

In terms of history, the Kingdom of Alpha certainly cannot be compared with the Kingdom of Avarat. Even this 800-year-old city is not worth mentioning in the Kingdom of Avarat.

However, in terms of comprehensive national strength, the two sides have reversed. The ancient Kingdom of Avalat is already on the decline, while the newly born Kingdom of Alpha is still climbing to the top.

"The last part is changed to horseback riding, which is a good opportunity to see what this most martial capital of the human race looks like!"

Prince Peter said with a smile.

As a member of the royal family, Prince Peter could be a happy parasite. Even if the Kingdom of Avarat was really destroyed, he could still receive preferential treatment due to his royal status.

However, as a passionate young man, I simply cannot watch my country fall apart, my family ruined, and my ancestral heritage lost.

After the king decided to reform, Prince Peter took the initiative to take over the position of head of the inspection team and went to the Alpha Kingdom to learn "how to enrich the country and strengthen the army."

Of course, the word "rich country" can be crossed out. The Alpha Kingdom itself is extremely poor, so it is obviously impossible to teach them how to become a rich country.

But when it comes to "strong soldiers", the Alpha Kingdom is professional. Even the lowest-ranking serfs are the strongest serfs in the entire continent.

The combat effectiveness of some elite serf army corps even exceeded that of the standing armies of many countries. This was a very explosive thing in any era.

There is no need to learn all of them. As long as the serf soldiers of the Kingdom of Avarat can have this 80% combat effectiveness, it will be enough to discourage the neighbors from spying.

"Your Highness, your safety..."

Before the minister could finish his words, Prince Peter interrupted him with a wave of his hand, saying, "Don't worry, I'm not that hateful.

Besides, this is the capital of the Alphas, they won't watch me get into an accident in public.

I still remember that a few years ago, the unlucky Claude was assassinated here. In order to calm the situation, the Alpha Kingdom even paid a small vassal state as compensation.

Unfortunately, the Hessian Kingdom was useless and was severely beaten by aliens. Now it has to bow to the Alpha Kingdom.

Maybe one day in the future, they will have to spit out the meat they ate!"

After saying that, Prince Peter walked out of the carriage, jumped up, mounted his beloved horse, and headed straight for Canglan City.

Feeling the exotic scenery, stopping and walking along the way, looking at the endless stream of people, the expressions of Prince Peter and his entourage gradually became solemn.

They were all ordinary citizens, but the Alphas were obviously more lively. The young men walking around walked steadily, and it was obvious at a glance that they had received military training.

Once a war breaks out, all it takes is an imperial edict and these people will immediately form an army by taking up arms.
Chapter 542:
Chapter 222: Reciprocity

"The Kingdom on the Chariot is truly worthy of its reputation!"

Prince Peter couldn't help but sigh as he walked along.

As the country that has experienced the most wars in the entire continent, the warmongering Alpha Kingdom has all its organizational structures from top to bottom designed to serve the war.

The racial hatred accumulated from years of orc invasions has masked various domestic conflicts.

The scenes before us are a true reflection of the Alpha Kingdom.

Soldier training requires nutritional support, and serf soldiers must fill their stomachs first before they can be combat-ready.

This requires the nobles to make sacrifices. If the serfs are exploited recklessly, talking about combat effectiveness is a joke.

If you want to survive on the battlefield, your private army must be able to fight; if you want your private army to be able to fight, the soldiers must be in good health.

The pressure of survival forced the aristocracy to make changes. Although the essence of society did not change, the aristocracy's exploitation of serfs did decrease.

More than 90% of the surplus value created by agricultural production was consumed in the military. The extravagant and decadent life of the aristocracy was becoming a legend in the Alpha Kingdom.

The dawn of the destruction of the Orc Empire has appeared, and everyone from the king to the ordinary nobles is holding their breath.

The hatred accumulated over hundreds of years has long been ingrained into the bones of every Alpha. The ruling group's goal is very clear, and all major factions are working hard to destroy the orcs.

Such a high centripetal force has only appeared in history books. To the representatives of the Kingdom of Avarat, it was an endless shock.

"Your Highness, the Alpha Kingdom is in a special situation. If not all the people were soldiers, it would have been destroyed by the orcs long ago.

However, the kingdom's real strength has only come in recent years, since Marshal Hudson took charge of the kingdom's army.

Currently, the military reforms of the countries in the Northern Continent and the Central Continent are all directed towards Marshal Hudson's military theory.

To sum it up, it can be summarized in six words: strong training, great logistics! "

Marquis Suarez said with a smile.

As the ambassador to Alpha, he was the one who pushed for this inspection. What he saw now shocked Prince Peter, and Marquis Suarez also felt a sense of accomplishment.

If the kingdom follows suit and becomes strong again, his name will definitely be mentioned in history books.

"What the Marquis said is right. It's a pity that Marshal Hudson is still young and has no intention of writing a book. Otherwise, I would definitely read it all night long!"

Prince Peter said with a smile.

In the continent of Aslant, those who can write books are all great figures who influence an era.

In terms of social influence, Hudson is far from that level, but his military theory is special. This thing is more practical.

Hudson did not write any works related to military theory, but that does not mean that others did not write any.

Among all the nobles of the Alpha Kingdom, who doesn't have a copy of "Harry's Art of War"?

It's just that these are all compiled by each party based on the information they collected and their own understanding.

"Your Highness, Marshal Hudson is in the capital right now. After the welcome banquet, you can communicate with him in person.

There will definitely be a lot of gains by then!"

Marquis Suarez encouraged calmly.

As a diplomat, Marquis Suarez is well-informed. After traveling all over the country for so many years, he believes that the Alpha model is the most suitable for his kingdom.

Hudson was in charge of the reception work for the Alpha Kingdom this time, which was his strong request, in order to promote the Alpha model to the representatives of the inspection team.

Without continuing the conversation, Prince Peter asked the question in his mind: "Mr. Marquis, it has been such a long time since we entered the Alpha Kingdom, why do we rarely see free people along the way?"

This is a realistic problem. The proportion of free people in the Alpha Kingdom is less than 3% of the total population, while in the Avarat Kingdom this proportion is as high as 26%.

And this proportion is not the highest. For example, the proportion of free people in the Frankish Kingdom and the Libyan Kingdom exceeded 50%.

In some countries in the southern continent, the proportion of free people even exceeds 70 percent.

Generally speaking, the higher the proportion of free people in a country, the higher the local economic vitality will be, and accordingly more money will be invested in the military, and the stronger the military strength will be.

The theory that was prevalent in the southern continent was directly reversed in the Alpha Kingdom.

Prince Peter cannot comment on the economic development of the Alpha Kingdom without in-depth research, but its military strength does run counter to this theory.

"Your Highness, the situation in the Alpha Kingdom is special. Years of war have led to a high death rate among the nobles, so many noble collateral branches who should have become commoners now have the opportunity to become nobles.

Here, almost all the noble sons have to go to the battlefield, including those distant relatives without titles, who must also join the battle.

After years of war, there are not many nobles or free people in the Alpha Kingdom."

Marquis Suarez explained with a little hesitation.

The fact that many nobles and free people of the Alpha Kingdom died in battle only shows that their situation was special, but it also implicitly reveals the struggle for living space among all social classes.

There were many nobles and many descendants of nobles, but not so many titles to inherit, which led to a surge in the number of free people.

The number of free people increased dramatically. Because of their closer relationship with the ruling group and the higher horizons brought about by their living environment, they were definitely more competitive than serfs.

The blacksmithing, shoemaking, and various handicrafts that were originally done by serfs were gradually replaced by free people.

As time went by, there were fewer and fewer jobs suitable for serfs, and their gradual elimination became an inevitable result of the development of the times.

Logically speaking, the Kingdom of Avarat should be like other countries in the southern continent, with a growing number of free people who gradually become the mainstream group in society.

What is embarrassing is that after accounting for more than a quarter, the number stagnated. It is obvious that someone has turned civilians who have personal freedom into serfs again.

This involves deep-seated social contradictions, and Marquis Suarez, who does not want to get into trouble, dares not say much.

Prince Peter, who was very perceptive, sighed secretly after realizing the truth.

The road to reform is not destined to be smooth. The mess of the Kingdom of Avarat has dragged on for too long. To carry out in-depth reforms will inevitably affect the interests of all parties.

Now everyone supports reform, and it seems that the situation of the reformists is very good. That is because the reformists have not yet taken any substantive measures and have not touched the core interests of any party.

Once the reform is fully launched and everyone needs to make sacrifices, the situation will be completely different.

...

"Your Highness Peter, welcome to your visit!"

In front of the palace, Hudson came forward with a group of princes and nobles to greet them.

This was the job of a reception minister, and there was no way to avoid it. In addition to him, the representative of the kingdom, there were also representatives of the royal family.

However, the old duke of the royal family chose to slack off and left all the reception work to Hudson.

Unfortunately, Hudson was not a diligent person, and the reception ceremony was kept as simple as possible.

Typos and grand welcomes did not exist. The Alpha Kingdom only wanted to gain international prestige, but it did not have the generosity to spend a fortune on these pretentious ceremonies.

"It is my honor to visit your country!

I hope that this visit will allow us to have a pleasant exchange and contribute to the development of relations between the two countries..."

Prince Peter responded with a smile.

...

Since they didn't know each other anyway, Hudson just exchanged a few polite words and invited the delegation to a welcome banquet.

The banquet arrangement was only average, but the standard was still very high. Caesar IV was present in person, and a number of ministers from the kingdom also appeared at the banquet one after another.

However, Prince Peter, the protagonist, was not interested in the banquet at all. No matter how many delicious dishes there were, they were not as important as the mission.

Moreover, due to limited funds, the food standards of the Alpha Kingdom were not very good. The monster meat used was just the hybrid offspring of artificially raised monsters and livestock.

There is no way, Warcraft is a strategic resource in the Alpha Kingdom.

Now, as long as a monster is captured and has decent fighting power, it will either be kept by local nobles or sent to the monster army.

Of course, the quality of wild monster meat is not that good. When it is served on the table, the main consideration is the presentation rather than simply the taste.

"Marshal Hudson, your country's culture is truly unique!"

Prince Peter jokingly complained.

These are all facts. Compared with other countries on the continent, the culture of the Alpha Kingdom is also unique.

In any world, those who are different are excluded. The Kingdom is eager to export its politics and culture, in fact, it also wants to change this kind of incompatibility.

"The land and water nurture the people.

Your Highness, you will get used to it slowly.

In fact, we are not as rigid as you think, for example: this banquet.

Due to the frequent wars, our important banquets are usually mixed with discussions on military and national affairs, so no noble ladies participate.

If it was an ordinary banquet, it would be similar to your country, not as serious as it is now."

Hudson explained with a smile.

If you don't want to change yourself, then change others. This is the pride of a great country!

The Principality of Moshi has already become Alpha, and the three kingdoms in the Central Continent are in the process of becoming Alpha. If the Kingdom of Avarat also becomes Alpha, then the mainstream of the Aslant Continent in the future may become Alpha.

Racial conflicts have obscured ideological disputes, but that does not mean these conflicts no longer exist. If one day the human race dominates the continent, these issues will become the new focus of conflict.

"Marshal Hudson, the achievements your country has made in recent years have attracted worldwide attention. However, I have a question that I would like to ask you.

If one day the Orc Empire is destroyed and the racial war suddenly ceases, where will the Alpha Kingdom go? "

Prince Peter asked with concern.

The more you study the institutional structure of the Alpha Kingdom, the more you realize that this is a kingdom born for war.

During wartime, such a country can unleash the strongest combat power, but once the war is over, the situation will be completely different.

Many measures that were originally intended to promote the development of the kingdom may very likely become a cancer that restricts the development of the kingdom or even undermines the stability of the kingdom.

"Your Highness, you worry too much. Nothing in this world is unchanging except faith.

The measures formulated now only need to meet current needs.

As for future development, we will naturally overturn those inappropriate measures based on actual conditions and formulate new national policies.

Anyone who attempts to create a mechanism and operate it step by step forever will be eliminated by the world!

If the Orc Empire suddenly disappeared one day, the kingdom's national policy would definitely undergo major changes.

In fact, we have already formulated corresponding measures. However, the goal of destroying the Orc Empire has not yet been achieved, so it is not convenient to announce it to the public for the time being. "

Hudson said calmly.

What a bullshit corresponding measure. Destroying the Orc Empire is just a political slogan to unite the kingdom. Who would believe it except the younger generation?

Including Hudson, the originator of the strategy, who only wanted to gradually nibble away at the Orc Empire. Swallowing the Orc Empire in one gulp would be like a snake trying to swallow an elephant and choking to death.

According to the most optimistic estimate, the kingdom will be able to annex the behemoth Orc Empire within the next two hundred years.

During such a long period of time, no one knows what will happen in the meantime. No matter how perfect the plan is, it will become invalid because it cannot keep up with the times.

But the outside world believes that the Alpha Kingdom can destroy the Orc Empire, even though they themselves don't believe it.

This mysterious self-confidence is in line with the development trajectory of mankind. In the past years, mankind defeated one enemy after another and became the overlord of the continent.

As far as Hudson knew, there were people within the Human Alliance who proposed to destroy all races within fifty years and dominate the continent of Aslant.

Theoretically, the human race does have this strength. If all parties stop fighting among themselves, they can now launch a war to unify the continent.

"The Marshal is right. The system must change with the times. Our Avarat Kingdom was a step slow in reacting and fell behind.

This time I came to inspect and learn from your country how to enrich the country and strengthen the military!"

Prince Peter replied with a smile.

He didn't care about the future of the Alpha Kingdom. His tentative inquiry was mainly to find out whether the Alpha model could land smoothly.

In fact, there is no big problem in this regard. They are just following the trend. There are examples of several countries ahead of them.

Even if there are problems, they will be the countries ahead that have problems first. They can follow behind to learn from the experience and lessons and forge their own path.

Hudson, who understood all this, tried hard to hold back his laughter. The Alpha Kingdom's militarism was not something that could be easily learned.

Once a country embarks on this path, it will never become rich.

...

The top of the city wall of Odesburg County.

Looking at the several magic crystal cannons that appeared in the sky, Petrovich's face turned green with anger.

There is no doubt that such a powerful weapon could not have been made by the cult itself. It must have been the selfless contribution of some unlucky noble lord.

"Pass the order down, have the artillery fire on the enemy's magic crystal cannons. We must not let..."

Viscount Petrovich, who had escaped the disaster by chance, also had a bloody face. But he was lucky that it was someone else's blood and flesh.

Just as he was about to ask someone to activate the city defense magic circle, the words came to his lips but he swallowed them back.

A single misstep will lead to everlasting regret!

The lack of a defensive magic circle in Odesburg was like a girl without clothes, who could only be...

Deep down, he hated all those country nobles. Why did they hide so many magic crystal cannons?

Viscount Petrovich roared his order.

Chapter 233: The Beginning of Shaking the King's Power

"Bang!"

"ah!"

"ah!"

"Boom!"

"Boom!"

...

"kill!"

"That's enough!

These people are still useful, so they can't be given to you for the time being!"

The Lord of Darkness spoke in a hoarse voice.

There can be perversion in religion, but not all of it can be perverted. At least the person at the helm must have brains.

The phantom frowned slightly, but soon returned to normal.

He could still tell the difference between having one meal full and not having enough every other meal.

"Can!

After saying this, the evil god disappeared directly into the sky. Along with the shadow, the corpses all over the city also disappeared.

...

As the survivors left, news of the fall of Oldsburg reached Governor Ginsburg.

As the person who caused all this, how could he have a good ending?

...

In the Mountain Territory, Hudson, who received the news, was almost stunned.

When did cults become so powerful?

Isn't it ridiculous that the Five-Nation Alliance was able to stir up chaos even though they were well prepared?

The military reforms of the two countries in the Northern Continent were relatively thorough, the strength of the local nobles' private armies was relatively strong, and they had both successfully expanded outward, so internal conflicts had been eased. Naturally, there was no problem in doing so.

The only good news is that this wave of cults has affected more than just the three kingdoms of Central Continent.

Almost all the countries and ethnic groups in the southern continent have experienced cult rebellions in recent times.

If everyone is in turmoil together, it is equivalent to no turmoil at all.

Whoever can get out of the crisis first will have an advantage in this round of competition.

"Duke, there is urgent news from the capital, and His Majesty wants you to attend a meeting immediately!"

Tom's words brought Hudson back to reality from his thoughts.

"knew!

Jenny, inform Madam that I am going to the capital and will not be having dinner tonight.

Compared to Maxim who likes to travel through the clouds, Bear Stearns prefers to run on the ground, as if he would lose his sense of security if he leaves the earth.

...

Jade Palace, stepping into it again, Hudson has become a frequent visitor here.

Whether it is the Red Dragon or the Earth Bear, they are both unique on the continent and there is no possibility of impersonation.

"A rebellion broke out in the Falcon Kingdom. The rebels attacked the capital and the king died in the chaos!"

After Foreign Secretary Earl Francis finished explaining, Hudson was still confused.

What does a coup in an overseas kingdom have to do with the Alpha Kingdom?

Perhaps noticing Hudson's reaction, he added.

"The Falcon Kingdom was not a simple aristocratic coup. The rebellion was initiated by commercial aristocrats. These people rose to power with the rise of maritime trade, and many of them were pirates in their past.

It is very likely that the death of Henry V was not an accident, but was done intentionally by these guys.

According to the intelligence we have collected, the Zijinhua Dynasty has been sparsely populated in recent years, and accidents have frequently occurred to the direct heirs. After the annihilation of Henry V's family, the royal family has no direct heirs.

As for the remaining collateral and distant branches, the blood relationships are too complicated to rank the successors. "

Hudson took a deep breath after getting the definite answer.

It has to be admitted that this group of emerging business nobles knows how to play. In order to avoid the king's revenge later, they simply killed off the royal family.

However, the political impact of this would be too bad, as it would completely undermine the sacred status of the royal power and the status of the nobility.

Since their birth, the royal power and the nobility have been deeply bound together. The nobility's glory comes from the royal family, and the nobility is the biggest royalist party.

The status of both parties is completely one of mutual loss and mutual gain.

The current royal legal system all originated from the imperial era.

Either they were dukes and earls appointed by the emperor and set up their own kingdoms when the empire was divided; or they had royal blood and, after the royal family died out, they came to power under the pretext of inheriting the royal glory.

The rise of a new royal family usually happens after the old royal family has died out, and they are pushed to the throne because of their own strength and royal blood.

To sum it up in one sentence: royal power is passed on through blood.

The way the Falcon Kingdom plays this time is obviously different. Others just wait for the royal family to become extinct normally, but they use physical methods to make the royal family extinct.

This is definitely breaking the rules!

If these rebels cannot be put down, once this precedent is set, the world will be in chaos in the future.

As a staunch royalist, Hudson immediately chose to join the other ministers in denouncing the shameless behavior of these rebels.

There is no other way. As one of the most powerful people in the kingdom, I must stand firm at this time.

When something like this happens, no matter who is the king, he will doubt the loyalty of his subordinates. The more powerful the princes are, the more likely they are to be suspected.

Fortunately, Hudson was not born into a high-class family, his rise was too short, and his network of contacts was mostly at the lower levels. From all aspects, he was not a potential candidate for the throne.

Otherwise, he would not have been notified to attend this special meeting.

Falcon Kingdom.

The leaders of the emerging aristocratic group looked at the dead body of Henry V in front of them, their faces grim and gloomy.

Viscount Catalino sneered.

"Victoire Catalino, you make it sound easy. The situation has developed to this point, and we are the enemy of the whole world.

"Baron Miklos, you are wrong. I never expected a group of serfs to help us accomplish our goals, but as long as they stand on our side, they can easily ruin the enemy's plans.

No matter who inherits this power, he will be the most powerful person in the Falcon Kingdom, which is equivalent to directly increasing the family's strength several times.

The participation of various domestic factions in the fight is only the beginning. With the intervention of the Human Alliance, it won't be long before all the countries on the continent will also participate in the fight for the throne.

As far as I know, there are at least seven royal families on the continent of Aslant who have the right to inherit the legacy of the Purple Gold Flower Dynasty.

If we look through the genealogical records of royal families of various countries, perhaps we can find some more.

With so many forces mixed together, who will care about us?

This happens to be our best chance!

All we need to do is seize the opportunity and spread the idea of liberating serfs when there is civil unrest on all sides.

When the time is right, we can bring our supporters back and fight back to reclaim the fruits of victory!"

It was pure nonsense. Even Viscount Catalino himself did not believe that his lies could come true, but he still said it.

No matter what, he had to get through this crisis first. If he couldn't fool everyone, and a few idiots showed up and tied him up and handed him over to the enemy as a token of his loyalty, that would be a real tragedy.

If someone falls into the water, even if he grabs a straw, he will use it as a life jacket.

After a moment, everyone's position was shaken. Although the probability of success of Viscount Catalino's proposal was low, it at least had the possibility of success.

"Everyone, the private armies of nobles from all over the country have already taken action, and we don't have much time left to make a decision.
